If by slight chance at the time of purchase it is not available to sell or ship, you will be notified by the next business day and payment will be refunded in full. Epiphone - Les Paul Studio Deluxe Custom Shop A extra-special offering from Epiphone, the Les Paul Studio Deluxe Custom Shop offers an amazing value for a set-neck instrument with superior tone due to the beefy Alnico Classic Plus pickups. The upgraded gold hardware trim sets this guitar apart from a number of others, stunningly similar to the original Gibson Les Paul Custom from which it gained its namesake. An amazing instrument well suited for blues, rock, or jazz, this instrument is sure to please even the most demanding of musicians from beginners to advanced users. Mahogany body with carved top Set mahogany neck Slim-tapered profile 24-3/4" scale Rosewood fingerboard with trapezoid inlays 22-frets 12" radius 1-11/16" nut width Alnico Classic Plus humbucking pickups 2 volume, 2 tune controls with 3-position toggle LockTone Tune-O-Matic bridge and stopbar tailpiece Gold hardware Some wear on gold plate Does not come with case IF YOU BUY IT AND YOU ARE NOT HAPPY WE HAVE THE 30 DAY MONEY BACK RETURN POLICY READ BELOW - THANK YOU SOLD AS USED AND AS IS ,BUT YOU DO HAVE 30 DAYS FROM DATE OF DELIVERY TO CONTACT US FOR A REFUND IF YOU ARE NOT HAPPY : Buyer is responsible for shipping charges back to us.
